name: Gura's Adventure
description:
Here's the best, smol and adorable shark! Gawr Gura!!! :D
She's from the mysterious deep sea city Atlantis. However the people can't find the city anymore. Gura decided to take an adventure! Help her to eat some food, beat the bad guys and find Atlantis! Maybe something still left there then Gura can keep it safe...

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move
Z: Attack / Confirm
X: Call help if get the orb
ESC: Pause (In Game)
F4: Fullscreen

Disclaimer

This non-commercial game is a fan-made work of Cover Corporation's hololive property, and produced according to Cover Corporation's Derivative Work License Agreement.

If you like this game, don't forget to support the Hololive Vtubers!

Changelog

v 1.0.3
 - Fix issue when beating final boss but some bullet won't disappeared.

v 1.0.2
 - Gura now can auto-attack with holding Z key.
 - Fix issue when beating some boss but will still have enemy reinforcements.

v 1.0.1 
 - Fix the crash when using Ina's skill but still beaten.
 - Fix the crash when using Ina or Kiara's skill and beat the final boss.
